title: Bring Me to Life
description: Trying to discover herself, Emberlyn turns her life around in hopes of one day saying "I've lived". She has to. Living in the big city is more than she expected, and falling in love wasn't on her list of things to experience, but she must face these challenges in order to truly live and find what brings her to life.**** This is a NEW ADULT NOVEL.
author: Dee Delgado
